Title: Relates to establishing maximum levels for PFCAs and PFSAs in drinking water
Summary: Authorizes the Department of Health to establish maximum levels for perfluoroalkyl carboxylic acids (PFCAs) and (PFSAs) perfluoroalkyl sulfonic acids in public drinking water.
LawCode: Add ยง1100-b, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing maximum contaminant levels for perfluoroalkyl carboxylic acids (PFCAs) and perfluoroalkyl sulfonic acids (PFSAs) in public drinking water
